trans-unit.source: Report the specifics of a value change involving a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: 报告有关 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 的值更改的细节。

trans-unit.source: This is used as a parameter in <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)" /> overrides.
trans-unit.target: 这用作 <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)" /> 重写中的参数。

trans-unit.source: This class parallels some of the members <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs> class, which is used to report event data for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged>, but the two classes serve different purposes.
trans-unit.target: 此类中指的某些成员<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs>类，该类用于报告的事件数据<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged>，但两个类用于不同的目的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo> is specifically used for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A> overrides, which offers class handling for an event that is not exposed as a public event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo> 是专门用于<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>重写，它可以提供类处理未公开为中的公共事件的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The element where the size is being changed.
trans-unit.target: 正在更改其大小的元素。

trans-unit.source: The previous size, before the change.
trans-unit.target: 更改前的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Width component of the size changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果大小的宽度分量更改，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Height component of the size changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果大小的高度分量更改，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: For the two Boolean parameters, note that you should report these as `true` only if the changes in the value are significant to rendering, or should interpret the values as such if reading existing values.
trans-unit.target: 注意，对于两个布尔参数，你应报告这些项目称为`true`只有中值的更改对呈现，是有意义，或如果读取现有的值应解释这种情况下的值。

trans-unit.source: Minor changes in the size values are possible due to precision side-effects, particularly when mathematical functions are applied to the double values.
trans-unit.target: 特别数学函数应用到双精度值，大小值中的小变动还可能由于精度副作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo" /> reports a size change that includes a significant change to the Height component.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo" /> 是否对包括高度分量显著更改在内的大小更改进行报告。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is a significant Height component change; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有显著的高度分量更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only, and can only be set in the initial <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的并且只能在初始设置<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new size being reported.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在报告的新大小。

trans-unit.source: The new size.
trans-unit.target: 新大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only, and can only be set through the initial <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的并且只能通过初始设置<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous size of the size-related value being reported as changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在报告为已更改的大小相关值的先前大小。

trans-unit.source: The previous size.
trans-unit.target: 先前的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only, and cannot be set by any direct means, it is being reported from an actual value on some instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的并且不能通过任何直接的方式设置，它是正在报告的实际值在某些实例上。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that declares whether the Width component of the size changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值声明大小的宽度分量是否已更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the width changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果宽度已更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only, and can only be set through the initial <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的并且只能通过初始设置<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo>构造函数。
